entity.description: Business that represents a customer or potential customer. The company that is billed in business transactions.

attributes.name: accountid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account.

attributes.name: accountcategorycode
attributes.description: Select a category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred.

constrainedList.name: account_accountcategorycode
constrainedList.description: Drop-down list for selecting the category of the account.

attributes.name: customersizecode
attributes.description: Select the size category or range of the account for segmentation and reporting purposes.

constrainedList.name: account_customersizecode
constrainedList.description: Size of the account.

attributes.name: preferredcontactmethodcode
attributes.description: Select the preferred method of contact.

constrainedList.name: account_preferredcontactmethodcode
constrainedList.description: Preferred contact method for the account.

attributes.name: customertypecode
attributes.description: Select the category that best describes the relationship between the account and your organization.

constrainedList.name: account_customertypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of the account.

attributes.name: accountratingcode
attributes.description: Select a rating to indicate the value of the customer account.

constrainedList.name: account_accountratingcode
constrainedList.description: Drop-down list for selecting account ratings.

attributes.name: industrycode
attributes.description: Select the account's primary industry for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

constrainedList.name: account_industrycode
constrainedList.description: Type of industry with which the account is associated.

items.displayName: Agriculture and Non-petrol Natural Resource Extraction

attributes.name: territorycode
attributes.description: Select a region or territory for the account for use in segmentation and analysis.

constrainedList.name: account_territorycode
constrainedList.description: Territory to which the account belongs.

attributes.name: accountclassificationcode
attributes.description: Select a classification code to indicate the potential value of the customer account based on the projected return on investment, cooperation level, sales cycle length or other criteria.

constrainedList.name: account_accountclassificationcode
constrainedList.description: Drop-down list for classifying an account.

attributes.name: businesstypecode
attributes.description: Select the legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes.

constrainedList.name: account_businesstypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of business associated with the account.

attributes.name: owningbusinessunit
attributes.description: Shows the business unit that the record owner belongs to.

attributes.name: traversedpath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: owninguser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the account.

attributes.name: paymenttermscode
attributes.description: Select the payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount.

constrainedList.name: account_paymenttermscode
constrainedList.description: Payment terms for the account.

attributes.name: shippingmethodcode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to the account's address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option.

constrainedList.name: account_shippingmethodcode
constrainedList.description: Method of shipment for the account.

attributes.name: primarycontactid
attributes.description: Choose the primary contact for the account to provide quick access to contact details.

attributes.name: participatesinworkflow
attributes.description: For system use only. Legacy Microsoft Dynamics CRM 3.0 workflow data.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type the company or business name.

attributes.name: accountnumber
attributes.description: Type an ID number or code for the account to quickly search and identify the account in system views.

attributes.name: revenue
attributes.description: Type the annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

attributes.name: numberofemployees
attributes.description: Type the number of employees that work at the account for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the company's website.

attributes.name: sic
attributes.description: Type the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the account's primary industry of business, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

attributes.name: ownershipcode
attributes.description: Select the account's ownership structure, such as public or private.

constrainedList.name: account_ownershipcode
constrainedList.description: Type of company ownership, such as public or private.

attributes.name: marketcap
attributes.description: Type the market capitalization of the account to identify the company's equity, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

attributes.name: sharesoutstanding
attributes.description: Type the number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

attributes.name: tickersymbol
attributes.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.

attributes.name: stockexchange
attributes.description: Type the stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company.

attributes.name: websiteurl
attributes.description: Type the account's website URL to get quick details about the company profile.

attributes.name: ftpsiteurl
attributes.description: Type the URL for the account's FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents.

attributes.name: emailaddress1
attributes.description: Type the primary email address for the account.

attributes.name: emailaddress2
attributes.description: Type the secondary email address for the account.

attributes.name: emailaddress3
attributes.description: Type an alternate email address for the account.

attributes.name: donotphone
attributes.description: Select whether the account allows phone calls. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from phone call activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: donotfax
attributes.description: Select whether the account allows faxes. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from fax activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number for this account.

attributes.name: donotemail
attributes.description: Select whether the account allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number for this account.

attributes.name: fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number for the account.

attributes.name: telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number for this account.

attributes.name: donotpostalmail
attributes.description: Select whether the account allows direct mail. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from letter activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: donotbulkemail
attributes.description: Select whether the account allows bulk email sent through campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but is excluded from email.

attributes.name: donotbulkpostalmail
attributes.description: Select whether the account allows bulk postal mail sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the postal mail.

attributes.name: creditlimit
attributes.description: Type the credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

attributes.name: creditonhold
attributes.description: Select whether the credit for the account is on hold. This is a useful reference while addressing the invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version number of the account.

attributes.name: parentaccountid
attributes.description: Choose the parent account associated with this account to show parent and child businesses in reporting and analytics.

attributes.name: aging30
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Shows whether the account is active or inactive. Inactive accounts are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

constrainedList.name: account_statecode
constrainedList.description: Status of the account.

attributes.name: aging60
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Select the account's status.

constrainedList.name: account_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the account.

attributes.name: aging90
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: address1_addressid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 1.

attributes.name: address1_addresstypecode
attributes.description: Select the primary address type.

constrainedList.name: account_address1_addresstypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of address for address 1, such as billing, shipping, or primary address.

attributes.name: address1_name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the primary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address1_primarycontactname
attributes.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's primary address.

attributes.name: address1_line1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_line2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_line3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_city
attributes.description: Type the city for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_stateorprovince
attributes.description: Type the state or province of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_county
attributes.description: Type the county for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_country
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_postofficebox
attributes.description: Type the post office box number of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_postalcode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_utcoffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: address1_freighttermscode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms for the primary address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

constrainedList.name: account_address1_freighttermscode
constrainedList.description: Freight terms for address 1.

attributes.name: address1_upszone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the primary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address1_latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address1_telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address1_shippingmethodcode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

constrainedList.name: account_address1_shippingmethodcode
constrainedList.description: Method of shipment for address 1.

attributes.name: address1_telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address2_addressid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 2.

attributes.name: address2_addresstypecode
attributes.description: Select the secondary address type.

constrainedList.name: account_address2_addresstypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of address for address 2, such as billing, shipping, or primary address.

attributes.name: address2_name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the secondary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address2_primarycontactname
attributes.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_line1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_line2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_line3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_city
attributes.description: Type the city for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_stateorprovince
attributes.description: Type the state or province of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_county
attributes.description: Type the county for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_country
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_postofficebox
attributes.description: Type the post office box number of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_postalcode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_utcoffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: address2_freighttermscode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms for the secondary address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

constrainedList.name: account_address2_freighttermscode
constrainedList.description: Freight terms for address 2.

attributes.name: address2_upszone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the secondary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address2_latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address2_telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address2_shippingmethodcode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

constrainedList.name: account_address2_shippingmethodcode
constrainedList.description: Method of shipment for address 2.

attributes.name: address2_telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: ownerid
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: preferredappointmentdaycode
attributes.description: Select the preferred day of the week for service appointments.

constrainedList.name: account_preferredappointmentdaycode
constrainedList.description: Day of the week that the account prefers for scheduling service activities.

attributes.name: preferredsystemuserid
attributes.description: Choose the preferred service representative for reference when you schedule service activities for the account.

attributes.name: preferredappointmenttimecode
attributes.description: Select the preferred time of day for service appointments.

constrainedList.name: account_preferredappointmenttimecode
constrainedList.description: Time of day that the account prefers for scheduling service activities.

attributes.name: merged
attributes.description: Shows whether the account has been merged with another account.

attributes.name: donotsendmm
attributes.description: Select whether the account accepts marketing materials, such as brochures or catalogs.

attributes.name: masterid
attributes.description: Shows the master account that the account was merged with.

attributes.name: lastusedincampaign
attributes.description: Shows the date when the account was last included in a marketing campaign or quick campaign.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: creditlimit_base
attributes.description: Shows the credit limit converted to the system's default base currency for reporting purposes.

attributes.name: aging30_base
attributes.description: The base currency equivalent of the aging 30 field.

attributes.name: revenue_base
attributes.description: Shows the annual revenue converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: aging90_base
attributes.description: The base currency equivalent of the aging 90 field.

attributes.name: marketcap_base
attributes.description: Shows the market capitalization converted to the system's default base currency.

attributes.name: aging60_base
attributes.description: The base currency equivalent of the aging 60 field.

attributes.name: yominame
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: owningteam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the account.

attributes.name: stageid
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: processid
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: address2_composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete secondary address.

attributes.name: address1_composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete primary address.

attributes.name: entityimageid
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: timespentbymeonemailandmeetings
attributes.description: Total time spent for emails (read and write) and meetings by me in relation to account record.

attributes.name: createdbyexternalparty
attributes.description: Shows the external party who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedbyexternalparty
attributes.description: Shows the external party who modified the record.

attributes.name: primarysatoriid
attributes.description: Primary Satori ID for Account

attributes.name: primarytwitterid
attributes.description: Primary Twitter ID for Account

attributes.name: slaid
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the Account record.

attributes.name: slainvokedid
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onholdtime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastonholdtime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: followemail
attributes.description: Information about whether to allow following email activity like opens, attachment views and link clicks for emails sent to the account.

attributes.name: marketingonly
attributes.description: Whether is only for marketing

attributes.name: territoryid
attributes.description: Choose the sales region or territory for the account to make sure the account is assigned to the correct representative and for use in segmentation and analysis.

attributes.name: opendeals
attributes.description: Number of open opportunities against an account and its child accounts.

attributes.name: opendeals_date
attributes.description: Last Updated time of rollup field Open Deals.

attributes.name: opendeals_state
attributes.description: State of rollup field Open Deals.

attributes.name: openrevenue
attributes.description: Sum of open revenue against an account and its child accounts.

attributes.name: openrevenue_base
attributes.description: Value of the Open Revenue in base currency.

attributes.name: openrevenue_date
attributes.description: Last Updated time of rollup field Open Revenue.

attributes.name: openrevenue_state
attributes.description: State of rollup field Open Revenue.

attributes.name: originatingleadid
attributes.description: Shows the lead that the account was created from if the account was created by converting a lead in Microsoft Dynamics 365. This is used to relate the account to data on the originating lead for use in reporting and analytics.

attributes.name: preferredequipmentid
attributes.description: Choose the account's preferred service facility or equipment to make sure services are scheduled correctly for the customer.

attributes.name: preferredserviceid
attributes.description: Choose the account's preferred service for reference when you schedule service activities.

attributes.name: defaultpricelevelid
attributes.description: Choose the default price list associated with the account to make sure the correct product prices for this customer are applied in sales opportunities, quotes, and orders.
